ctaCustomization.title: CTA Customization

ctaCustomization.previewDescription: This is how your CTA will appear in lead reports.

toast.resetDescription: CTA settings have been reset to defaults.

toast.updateAppointmentDescription: Appointment CTA has been updated successfully.

toast.resetAppointmentDescription: Appointment CTA has been reset to defaults.

defaultCTA.header: BOOST YOUR GBP SCORE &&& Increase your calls
defaultCTA.description: Learn how to pay your employees a month's salary by simply fixing what's broken. Get your free blueprint to crush your competition!
